pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Colour Boost Shampoo Purple 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The sulfate-free formula with Perfect Pigment mix concentration cleanses your hair while adding shine and vibrant colour, in 1 simple step.
1 product, 3 benefits:
- Maintain the vibrancy of your purple colour longer.**
- Boost the intensity of your purple colour.**
- Create soft pastel purple hues on a light hair base.
** This product works best in hair coloured with our Live Colour Ultra Brights Magnetic Purple. Colour result may vary if used on other shades or other colorants.

Suitable For: light hair base or hair coloured with our Live Colour Ultra Brights Magnetic Purple

Size: 150mL

Hair Colour: Purple

Warnings

Hair colourants can cause severe allergic reactions.
Read and follow instructions. This product is not intended for use on persons under the age of 16.
Temporary 'black henna' tattoos may increase your risk of allergy.
Do not colour your hair if:
- you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated and damaged scalp,
- you have ever experienced any reaction after colouring your hair,
- you have experienced a reaction to a temporary 'black henna' tattoo in the past.
Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows. Rinse hair well after application. Avoid contact with eyes.
Rinse immediately if product comes into contact with them. Use commercially available,
waterproof
plastic gloves. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid unnecessary skin contact2.

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

CAUTION

CAUTION
Keep out of reach of children. Read safety directions.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Aqua (Water, Eau) · Lauryl Glucoside · Cocamidopropyl Betaine · Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose · PEG-40 Hydrogenated
Castor Oil · Sodium Benzoate · Citric Acid · Parfum (Fragrance) · Sodium Chloride · Polyquaternium-37 · PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate ·
Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate · Panthenol · PPG-1 Trideceth-6 · Hexyl Cinnamal · Hydrated Silica · Sclerocarya Birrea
Seed Oil · Benzyl Alcohol · HC Blue No. 16 · Sorbitan Oleate · Linalool · Limonene · Basic Violet 2 · Citronellol

Directions

3 easy steps:
1. Apply Colour Boost Shampoo into wet hair instead of or after your normal shampoo.
2. Depending on your desired colour intensity, leave on between 3 to 5 minutes.
3. Rinse hair thoroughly until water runs clear.
Caution: Rinse immediately skin and bathroom surfaces from product residues until water runs clear,
both after applying and rinsing Colour Boost Shampoo off your hair.
Use as often as you like. We recommend wearing waterproof plastic gloves when applying this product.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

- you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated and damaged scalp,
